code: import axios from"axios";const API_URL="http://localhost:8080/contacts";export async function saveContact(contact){return await axios.post(API_URL,contact);}export async function getContacts(){let page=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:0;let size=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:10;return await axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"?page=").concat(page,"&size=").concat(size));}export async function getContact(id){return await axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/").concat(id));}export async function udpateContact(contact){return await axios.post(API_URL,contact);}export async function udpatePhoto(formData){return await axios.put("".concat(API_URL,"/photo"),formData);}export async function deleteContact(id){return await axios.delete("".concat(API_URL,"/delete/").concat(id));}
